# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 0.9.z   | :white_check_mark: |
| 0.8.z   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 0.8   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you have discovered a security bug, please send an email to security@cedarcode.com
instead of posting to the GitHub issue tracker.

Thank you!
